abstract: Itumeleng Isaack Khune (born 20 June 1987) is a South African professional footballer who plays as a goalkeeper for Kaizer Chiefs in the Premier Soccer League, as well as the South African national team, both of which he is captain.Khune is known for his quick reflexes and his distribution which has been hailed as "the best you will see anywhere" by former Liverpool FC goalkeeper Sander Westerveld.
